TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextPointer extends System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition

summary.span: 表示 或 中的一个位置。

span.span: Represents a position within a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类引入了以下术语：The class introduces the following terminology: - 位置-本质上， 始终指向内容中的 *位置* 。Position - Inherently, a always points to a *position* in content. 此类位置要么位于内容中的字符之间，要么位于为内容定义结构的流内容元素标记之间。Such positions either fall between characters in the content, or between flow content element tags that define structure for the content. - 当前位置-因为 始终指示位置，并且可以通过执行的许多操作 都是相对于当前指向的位置的 ，因此，只需引用由指示的位置 作为 *当前位置*即可。Current Position - Because a always indicates a position, and because many of the operations that can be performed through a are relative to the position currently pointed to by the , it makes sense to simply refer to the position indicated by a as the *current position*. - 插入位置- *插入* 位置是一个可以在其中添加新内容的位置，而不会破坏关联内容的任何语义规则。Insertion Position - An *insertion position* is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实际操作中，插入位置在内容中的任何位置都可以定位插入点。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 不是插入位置的有效位置的一个示例 是 (两个相邻标记之间的位置 ，即上一段的结束标记与下一段的开始标记之间的位置) 。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph). - 符号-出于 涉及符号的操作的目的，以下任一操作都被视为 *符号*：Symbol - For the purposes of operations that involve symbols, any of the following is considered to be a *symbol*: - 元素的开始或结束标记 。An opening or closing tag for a element. - 包含在或中的 元素 。A element contained within an or . 请注意，此类 始终只计为一个符号; 包含的任何其他内容或元素 不计为符号。Note that such a is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the are not counted as symbols. - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)]文本元素内的每个16位字符 。Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text element. - 文本容器- *文本容器* 是窗体上的流内容最终边框的元素;指示的位置 始终位于文本容器中。Text Container - A *text container* is the element that forms the ultimate border for the flow content at hand; the position indicated by a always falls within a text container. 当前，文本容器必须是 或 。Currently, a text container must be either a or a . 一般而言， 不支持不同文本容器中的实例之间的操作。Generally speaking, operations between instances in different text containers are not supported. - 文档-文本容器中的内容称为 *文档*，如 方法和 和属性中所示 。Document - The content in a text container is referred to as a *document*, as in the method and the and properties. 类旨在帮助遍历和操作流内容元素所表示的内容 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] ; 通常情况下，此类元素派生自 。The class is intended to facilitate traversal and manipulation of content that is represented by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] flow content elements; in general, such elements derive from . 有助于执行以下操作：Some of the operations that facilitates include the following: - 对当前位置与第二个指定位置进行序号比较。Perform an ordinal comparison of the current position with a second specified position. 请参见 方法。See the method. - 确定指定方向上与当前位置相邻的内容的类型。Determine the type of content adjacent to the current position in a specified direction. 请参见 方法和 枚举。See the method and enumeration. - 获取 作用域或与当前位置相邻的。Get the that scopes or is adjacent to the current position. 请参阅 和 方法。See and the method. - 获取作用域为当前文档的文本容器。Get the text container that scopes the current document. 请参阅 属性。See the property. - 在当前位置之前或之后获取指定数目的字符。Get a specified number of characters preceding or following the current position. 请参见 方法。See the method. - 在当前位置插入字符串。Insert a string of characters at the current position. 请参见 方法。See the method. - 在内容中查找行边界。Find line boundaries in content. 请参见 方法和 属性。See the method and property. - 将 位置和符号偏移量转换为内容。Translate between positions and symbol offsets into content. 请参阅 和 方法。See the and methods. - 通过转换 位置和表示相对坐标来执行可视命中测试 。Perform visual hit testing by translating between a position and a representing relative coordinates. - 查找附近的插入位置，或检查当前位置是否为插入位置。Find a nearby insertion position, or check whether the current position is an insertion position. 请参阅 和 方法和 属性。See the and methods and the property. 对象的位置和 指示 是不可变的。The position and indicated by a object are immutable. 在编辑或修改内容时，由指示的位置 不会相对于周围文本更改; 而是根据内容的开头调整该位置的偏移量，以反映内容中的新相对位置。When content is edited or modified, the position indicated by a does not change relative to the surrounding text; rather the offset of that position from the beginning of content is adjusted correspondingly to reflect the new relative position in content. 例如， 指示给定段落开头位置的位置将继续指向该段的开头，即使在段落之前或之后插入或删除内容也是如此。For example, a that indicates a position at the beginning of a given paragraph continues to point to the beginning of that paragraph even when content is inserted or deleted before or after the paragraph. 类不提供任何公共构造函数。The class does not provide any public constructors. 的实例 是使用其他对象的属性或方法创建的， (包括 ) 的其他对象。An instance of is created by using properties or methods of other objects (including other objects). 下面的列表提供了一些方法和属性的示例，这些示例创建并返回 。The following list provides a few examples of methods and properties that create and return a . 此列表并不详尽：This list is not exhaustive: - 从 ： 和 。From a : and . - 从 ： 、 、 和 。From a : , , , and . - 从 (文本容器) ： 、 和 。From a (text container): , , and . - 从 (文本容器) ： 和 From a (text container): , and - 从现有的 ： 、 、 和 。From an existing : , , , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用在 指定的文本容器中的第一个元素内部查找位置。The following example demonstrates how to use a to find a position just inside of the first element in a specified text container. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_textpointer1)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_textpointer1)] 下面的示例使用设施实现了一个简单的查找算法 。The following example implements a simplistic find algorithm using facilities. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_textpointer2)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_TextPointer2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_textpointer2)]

param.name: position
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要与当前位置进行比较的位置。

span.span: A that specifies a position to compare to the current position.

summary.span: 对当前 和第二个指定 所表示位置的顺序进行比较。

span.span: Performs an ordinal comparison between the positions specified by the current and a second specified .

returns.span: 如果当前 位于 之前，则为 -1；如果位置相同，则为 0；如果当前 位于 之后，则为 +1。

span.span: -1 if the current precedes ; 0 if the locations are the same; +1 if the current follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值为-1，则指示当前指定的位置 位于指定的位置之前 `position` 。A value of -1 indicates that the position specified by the current precedes the position specified by `position`. 值0表示指示的位置相等。A value of 0 indicates that the indicated positions are equal. 如果值为正值 + 1，则指示当前指定的位置在 指定的位置之后 `position` 。A value of positive +1 indicates that the position specified by the current follows the position specified by `position`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法的用法。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 在此示例中， 方法与方法结合使用， 以测试指定的是否为 空。In the example, the method is used in conjunction with the method to test whether a specified is empty. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)]

exception.span: 指定位于与当前位置相关联的文本容器之外的某个位置。

span.span: specifies a position outside of the text container associated with the current position.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 DeleteTextInRun(int32 count) cil managed
Public Function DeleteTextInRun (count As Integer) As Integer

param.name: count
param.span: 从当前位置开始要删除的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters to delete, starting at the current position.

param.span: 指定正值将删除当前位置之后的字符；指定负值将删除当前位置之前的字符。

span.span: Specify a positive value to delete characters that follow the current position; specify a negative value to delete characters that precede the current position.

summary.span: 从当前 指示的位置开始删除指定数目的字符。

span.span: Deletes the specified number of characters from the position indicated by the current .

returns.span: 实际删除的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters actually deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定一个正值，以删除当前位置后面的字符 (如) 中所示 ; 指定一个负值以删除当前位置前面的字符 (与) 中的相同 。Specify a positive value to delete characters that follow the current position (as in ); specify a negative value to delete characters that precede the current position (as in ). 实际删除的字符数可能小于指定的数目 `count` 。The number of characters actually deleted may be less than the number specified by `count`. 如果指定的字符数超过了要删除的字符数，则会发生这种情况 `count` 。This happens in cases where `count` specifies more characters than exist to be deleted.

exception.span: 在不允许出现文本的位置处调用此方法。

span.span: The method is called at a position where text is not allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性返回的位置作为基线位置，从该位置开始使用相对于其他位置的相对偏移量。Use the position returned by this property as a baseline position from which to work with relative offsets to other positions. 和 方法提供了一种在位置和位置偏移量之间进行转换的方法。The and methods provide a way to translate between positions and position offsets. 返回的的 始终是文本容器 ( 或 ) ，而不是 。The for the returned is always a text container ( or ), rather than a .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Rect GetCharacterRect(valuetype System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function GetCharacterRect (direction As LogicalDirection) As Rect

param.name: direction
param.span: 值之一，它指定查找内容边框时的逻辑方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the logical direction in which to find a content bounding box.

summary.span: 返回在指定逻辑方向上的边界正好位于当前 处的内容的边框 ()。

span.span: Returns a bounding box () for content that borders the current in the specified logical direction.

returns.span: 在指定方向上的边界正好位于当前 处的内容的边框；或者，如果当前没有可用的有效布局信息，则为 。

span.span: A bounding box for content that borders the current in the specified direction, or if current, valid layout information is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于此方法的目的，边缘不被视为内容。 edges are not considered content for the purposes of this method. 如果 定位在 边缘之前，则返回值为指定方向下的下一个非内容的边界框 。If the is positioned before a edge, the return value is a bounding box for the next non- content in the specified direction. 如果指定方向没有任何内容，则返回零宽度，其 高度与前面任何内容的高度匹配。If there is no content in the specified direction, a zero-width is returned with a height matching the height of any preceding content. 此方法执行的操作取决于有效的布局。The operation performed by this method depends on a valid layout. 必要时，此方法会在继续操作之前尝试自动重新生成有效的布局。When necessary, this method attempts to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可能比较昂贵。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 使用 属性来检查有效的布局，然后执行可以重新生成布局的操作。Use the property to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer GetInsertionPosition(valuetype System.Windows.Documents.LogicalDirection direction) cil managed
Public Function GetInsertionPosition (direction As LogicalDirection) As TextPointer

param.name: direction
param.span: 值之一，它指定搜索最近插入位置时的逻辑方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the logical direction in which to search for the closest insertion position.

summary.span: 返回一个指向指定逻辑方向上的最近插入位置的 。

span.span: Returns a to the closest insertion position in the specified logical direction.

returns.span: 一个指向指定方向上的最近插入位置的 。

span.span: A to the closest insertion position in the specified direction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入位置是可以在不破坏关联内容的任何语义规则的情况下添加新内容的位置。An insertion position is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实际操作中，插入位置在内容中的任何位置都可以定位插入点。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 不是插入位置的有效位置的一个示例 是 (两个相邻标记之间的位置 ，即上一段的结束标记与下一段的开始标记之间的位置) 。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph). 如果 已指向有效插入位置，但非空格式化序列的结束标记在给定方向上直接位于该位置，则 此方法返回的将调整为指向紧靠在格式设置序列结束后的插入位置。If the already points to a valid insertion position, but the closing tag for a non-empty formatting sequence directly follows that position in the given direction, then the returned by this method is adjusted to point to the insertion position just after the close of the formatting sequence. 例如，请考虑标记序列 `ab` 。For example, consider the markup sequence `ab`. 请注意，字母之间有两个插入位置，在结束标记前面有两个插入位置 `a` `b` `Bold` ，另一个在结束 `Bold` 标记之后。Note that there are two insertion positions between the letters `a` and `b` - one that precedes the closing `Bold` tag, and one directly following the closing `Bold` tag. 如果 在上调用的 位置紧靠在 `a` 结束标记之前、结束标记之前和的位置，则 `Bold` 会将返回的调整为 `direction` 指向 `b` 结束标记后紧靠字母之前的位置 `Bold` 。If is called on a to the position directly after the letter `a` and before of the closing `Bold` tag, and with a `direction` of , the returned is adjusted to point to the position just before the letter `b`, after the closing `Bold` tag. 当使用相对逻辑方向时，将会进行类似的调整来打开格式设置标记。A similar adjustment is made for opening formatting tags when working in the opposite logical direction. 此方法旨在提供一种方法，用于在类似情况下在插入位置之间消除歧义。This method is intended to provide a means of disambiguation between insertion positions in similar cases. 当涉及一系列结构标记时，此方法还可用于选择插入点。This method can also be used to be selective about insertion points when a sequence of structural tags is involved. 例如，在结束段落标记之间的某个位置时，可以使用 direction 参数选择上一 (段落开头的最近的插入点， (通过指定) 来指定 ) 或上一段的末尾 。For example, when at a position between closing and opening paragraph tags, the direction parameter can be used to select the closest insertion point at the beginning of the following paragraph (by specifying ) or at the end of the preceding paragraph (by specifying ). 如果指针已位于插入位置，并且指定的中没有相邻的格式设置标记 `direction` ，则返回的 指向与调用相同的位置 。If the pointer is already at insertion position, and there are no adjacent formatting tags in the specified `direction`, the returned points to the same position as the calling . 相对于所指向的位置，不存在有效的插入位置 。It is possible that no valid insertion position exists relative to the position pointed to by a . 如果引用的内容在结构上不完整（如在空表或列表中），则会发生这种情况。This can happen if the referenced content is structurally incomplete, as in an empty table or list. 在这种情况下，此方法只返回一个 与 调用此方法的相同位置。In such cases, this method simply returns a to the same position as the from which this method was called. 此方法始终返回有效的 。This method always returns a valid . ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 方法检查指定的是否为 可打印内容的空。This example shows how to use the method to check whether a specified is empty of printable content. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_getinsertionposition)]

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它指向相对于当前 指定的行的开始位置。

span.span: Returns a to the beginning of a line that is specified relative to the current .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer GetLineStartPosition(int32 count) cil managed
Public Function GetLineStartPosition (count As Integer) As TextPointer

param.name: count
param.span: 在确定要返回其开始位置的行时要跳过的行开始位置标记数。

span.span: The number of start-of-line markers to skip when determining the line for which to return the starting position.

param.span: 负值指定前面的行，0 指定当前行，正值指定后面的行。

span.span: Negative values specify preceding lines, 0 specifies the current line, and positive values specify following lines.

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它指向相对于当前 指定的行的开始位置。

span.span: Returns a to the beginning of a line that is specified relative to the current .

returns.span: 一个指向指定行的开始位置的 （ 设置为 ）；或者，如果指定行超出范围或无法定位，则为 。

span.span: A pointing to the beginning of the specified line (with the set to ), or if the specified line is out of range or otherwise cannot be located.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指向的是不 明确的位置（例如，在两行之间），则选择由指定的方向的线条 作为相对起始行。If the points to an ambiguous position, for example, between two lines, the line in the direction specified by is selected as the relative starting line. 此方法执行的操作取决于有效的布局。The operation performed by this method depends on a valid layout. 必要时，此方法会在继续操作之前尝试自动重新生成有效的布局。When necessary, this method attempts to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可能比较昂贵。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 在执行可重新生成布局的操作之前，使用检查有效的布局。Use to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer GetLineStartPosition (int count, out int actualCount);

Public Function GetLineStartPosition (count As Integer, ByRef actualCount As Integer) As TextPointer
public: System::Windows::Documents::TextPointer ^ GetLineStartPosition(int count, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % actualCount);

param.name: count
param.span: 在确定要返回其开始位置的行时要跳过的行开始位置标记数。

span.span: The number of start-of-line markers to skip when determining the line for which to return the starting position.

param.span: 负值指定前面的行，0 指定当前行，正值指定后面的行。

span.span: Negative values specify preceding lines, 0 specifies the current line, and positive values specify following lines.

param.name: actualCount
param.span: 此方法返回时，将包含在确定要返回其开始位置的行时所实际跳过的行开始位置标记数。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the actual number of start-of-line markers that were skipped when determining the line for which to return the starting position.

param.span: 如果在跳过指定行数之前遇到内容的开始或结束位置，则此值可能小于 。

span.span: This value may be less than if the beginning or end of content is encountered before the specified number of lines are skipped.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 返回一个指向相对于当前 所指定行的开始位置的 ，并报告跳过的行数。

span.span: Returns a to the beginning of a line that is specified relative to the current , and reports how many lines were skipped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指向的是 不明确的位置（例如，在两行之间），则选择由属性指定的方向上的线条 作为相对起始行。If the points to an ambiguous position, for example, between two lines, the line in the direction specified by the property is selected as the relative starting line.

param.name: direction

remarks.format: ## Remarks *插入位置*是可以在不破坏关联内容的任何语义规则的情况下添加新内容的位置。An *insertion position* is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实际操作中，插入位置在内容中的任何位置都可以定位插入点。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 不是插入位置的有效位置的一个示例 是 (两个相邻标记之间的位置 ，即上一段的结束标记与下一段的开始标记之间的位置) 。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法的用法。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 该示例使用 方法遍历内容元素边界，以便对 两个指定实例之间存在的元素数进行计数 。The example uses the method to traverse content element boundaries in order to count the number of elements present between two specified instances. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetNextInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_getnextinsertionposition)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_GetNextInsertionPosition](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_getnextinsertionposition)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只返回不间断的文本运行。This method returns only uninterrupted runs of text. 如果除之外的任何符号类型 在指定方向上与当前相邻，则不返回任何内容 。Nothing is returned if any symbol type other than is adjacent to the current in the specified direction. 同样，文本仅返回到下一个非文本符号。Similarly, text is returned only up to the next non-text symbol. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法的用法。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 该示例使用 方法来实现简单的文本提取程序。The example uses the method to implement a simple text extractor. 方法返回两个指定实例之间的所有文本的字符串串联 。The method returns a string concatenation of all text between two specified instances. 尽管该示例可用于提取两个实例之间的任何文本 ，但它仅用于说明目的，不应在生产代码中使用。While the example can be used to extract any text between two instances, it is intended for illustrative purposes only, and should not be used in production code. 改用 属性。Use the property instead. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前位置相关联的文本容器是否具有有效（最新）的布局。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the text container associated with the current position has a valid (up-to-date) layout.

value.span: 如果布局是最新的而且有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the layout is current and valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必要时，依赖于有效布局 (的操作（如 方法、 方法和 属性) 尝试在继续操作之前自动重新生成有效的布局。When necessary, operations that depend on a valid layout (such as the method, method, and property) attempt to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可能比较昂贵。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 使用此属性可以在执行可能再生布局的操作前检查有效的布局。Use this property to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer InsertParagraphBreak() cil managed

summary.span: 在当前位置插入一个分段符。

span.span: Inserts a paragraph break at the current position.

returns.span: 一个指向新段落开始位置 () 的 。

span.span: A to the beginning () of the new paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当当前位置在现有元素内时调用此方法 ，则现有段落及其包含的任何内容会拆分为当前位置的两个段落。If this method is called when the current position is inside of an existing element, the existing paragraph and any content it contains are split into two paragraphs at the current position. 如果当当前位置不在现有段落内时调用此方法，则插入一个新的空段落。If this method is called when the current position is not inside of an existing paragraph, a new, empty paragraph is inserted. 如果调用此方法的位置不适合拆分或插入段落 (例如，如果当前位置在 元素) 内，则会引发异常。If this method is called at a position unsuitable for splitting or inserting a paragraph (for example, if the current position is inside of a element), an exception is thrown.

exception.span: 应针对无法进行拆分以容纳一个新段落的位置调用此方法，例如在 或 的范围内。

span.span: This method is called on a position that cannot be split to accommodate a new paragraph, such as in the scope of a or .

param.span: 要插入的文本。

span.span: The text to insert.

summary.span: 将指定文本插入到文本 中的当前位置。

span.span: Inserts the specified text into the text at the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的 作用域不是 元素， 则会随一起插入 `textData` 。If the is not scoped by a element, a is inserted along with the `textData`.

exception.span: 当前位置没有位于 元素内。

span.span: The current position is not within a element.
is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAtInsertionPosition As Boolean
public: property bool IsAtInsertionPosition { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前位置是否是一个插入位置。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current position is an insertion position.

value.span: 如果当前位置是插入位置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current position is an insertion position; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 插入位置是可以在不破坏关联内容的任何语义规则的情况下添加新内容的位置。An insertion position is a position where new content may be added without breaking any semantic rules for the associated content. 在实际操作中，插入位置在内容中的任何位置都可以定位插入点。In practice, an insertion position is anywhere in content where a caret may be positioned. 不是插入位置的有效位置的一个示例 是 (两个相邻标记之间的位置 ，即上一段的结束标记与下一段的开始标记之间的位置) 。An example of a valid position that is not an insertion position is the position between two adjacent tags (that is, between the closing tag of the preceding paragraph and the opening tag of the next paragraph).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsAtLineStartPosition As Boolean
public: property bool IsAtLineStartPosition { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前位置是否位于行的开始处。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the current position is at the beginning of a line.

value.span: 如果当前位置位于行的开始处，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current position is at the beginning of a line; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指向的是 不明确的位置（例如，在两行之间），则选择由属性指定的方向上的线条 作为相对起始行。If the points to an ambiguous position, for example, between two lines, the line in the direction specified by the property is selected as the relative starting line. 此属性执行的操作取决于有效的布局。The operation performed by this property depends on a valid layout. 必要时，此方法会在继续操作之前尝试自动重新生成有效的布局。When necessary, this method attempts to automatically regenerate a valid layout before proceeding with the operation. 重新生成布局可能比较昂贵。Regenerating a layout can be a relatively expensive operation. 使用 属性来检查有效的布局，然后执行可以重新生成布局的操作。Use the property to check for a valid layout before performing operations that may regenerate the layout. 请参阅[布局](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout)以了解详细信息。For more information, see [Layout](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/layout).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsInSameDocument(class System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer textPosition) cil managed
Public Function IsInSameDocument (textPosition As TextPointer) As Boolean

param.name: textPosition
param.span: 一个 ，它指定要与当前位置进行比较的位置。

span.span: A that specifies a position to compare to the current position.

summary.span: 指示指定位置与当前位置是否位于相同的文本容器内。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified position is in the same text container as the current position.

returns.span: 如果 指示的位置与当前位置位于相同的文本容器内，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if indicates a position that is in the same text container as the current position; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 涉及多个实例的大多数操作仅在所涉及的 实例指示位于同一文本容器范围内的位置时才有效。Most operations that involve multiple instances are only valid if the instances in question indicate positions that are in the same text container scope. 例如 ，和 方法不能与一起用于与 当前位置关联的文本容器之外的位置。For example the and methods cannot be used with a to a position outside of the text container associated with the current position. 使用此方法可验证指定的 与此类操作的当前位置是否兼容。Use this method to verify that a specified is compatible with the current position for such operations. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法的用法。The following example demonstrates a use for this method. 当无法保证所有三个位置都属于同一文本容器时，此示例使用方法来检查是否在情况下的两个其他指定实例之间定位指定的。The example uses the method to check whether a specified is positioned between two other specified instances in a situation when there is no guarantee that all three positions belong to the same text container. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_IsInSameDocument](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textpointer_isinsamedocument)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextPointer_IsInSameDocument](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textpointer_isinsamedocument)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取与当前位置相关联的逻辑方向，用于消除与当前位置相关联内容的不确定性。

span.span: Gets the logical direction associated with the current position which is used to disambiguate content associated with the current position.

value.span: 与当前位置相关联的 值。

span.span: The value that is associated with the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为如何使用此属性的示例， 由命中测试方法返回的会提供一个介于文本两个字符之间的命中。As an example of how this property is used, the of the returned by a hit test method gives a hit that is between two characters of text. 逻辑方向指定实际命中了两个字符中的哪一个。The logical direction specifies which of the two characters was actually hit - the left or the right.
